channel.title: Yui's personal task manager
channel.description: Recent content on Yui's personal task manager

item.title: Download and Install
item.description: Project is in alpha stage now, some features might be missing Yui have 2 clients: Command line interface, free, requires python Graphical user interface (gui). Aplha is free As for GUI requires a lot of effort and testing (even worse - we have to pay 3rd party for certification and distribution) stable releases will be paid, unless we got enought donations to keep it free Installation Before you begin It’s recommended to install git first.
